alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 03 at 7:18PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...An intense snow shower will impact portions of northwestern Lake, east central Sanders and southwestern Flathead Counties through 800 PM MST... At 717 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking an intense snow shower 14 miles west of Big Arm, or 21 miles northwest of Polson, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Visibility one-half mile or less. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Low visibility could result in dangerous driving conditions. Highway 28 and US-93 could be very slick. Take it slow especially around curves. Locations impacted include... Rocky Point, Kings Point, Big Arm, Jette, Proctor, Lake Mary Ronan, Elmo, Rollins, Niarada, Dayton and Lonepine. This includes Highway 93 N between mile markers 63 and 93. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
